00020 #include "AttributeFinder.h"
00021 #include "brics_3d/core/Logger.h"

00023 namespace brics_3d {
00024 
00025 namespace rsg {
00026 
00027 AttributeFinder::AttributeFinder() : INodeVisitor(downwards) {
00028         reset();
00029 }
00030 
00031 AttributeFinder::~AttributeFinder() {
00032 
00033 }
00034 
00035 void AttributeFinder::visit(Node* node) {
00036         assert (node != 0);
00037         LOG(DEBUG) << "Visiting node with ID: " << node->getId();
00038 
00039         /* check for duplicates (possibly causesd by _graph_ traversal) */
00040         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(matchingNodes.size()); ++i) {
00041                 if (matchingNodes[i] == node) {
00042                         return; //just stop
00043                 }
00044         }
00045 
00046         /* check if attributes match */
00047         bool attributesMatch = false;
00048         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(queryAttributes.size()); ++i) {
00049                 attributesMatch = false;
00050                 if (attributeListContainsAttribute(node->getAttributes(), queryAttributes[i]) == false) {
00051                         break;
00052                 }
00053                 attributesMatch = true; // returns true only when all loops are sucesfully/completely traversed
00054         }
00055 
00056         if (attributesMatch == true) {
00057                 LOG(DEBUG) << " Adding node as it has: ";
00058                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(queryAttributes.size()); ++i) {
00059                         LOG(DEBUG) << " " << queryAttributes[i];
00060                 }
00061                 matchingNodes.push_back(node);
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void AttributeFinder::visit(Group* node){
00066         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00067 }
00068 
00069 void AttributeFinder::visit(Transform* node){
00070         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00071 }
00072 
00073 void AttributeFinder::visit(GeometricNode* node){
00074         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00075 }
00076 
00077 void AttributeFinder::reset() {
00078         matchingNodes.clear();
00079 }
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 }
